comment._content: US Secretary of State during WWI: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Lansing

comment.author: 40472720@N00
comment._content: Served as Secretary of State from June 23, 1915 to February 13, 1920, during Woodrow Wilson administration. He attended the Peace Conference held at Versailles, France, as one of the five U.S. delegates in 1919. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Lansing www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=21919
